findings.title: Unlimited rewards can be withdrawn
findings.description: At every new stake deposit, rewards up to that time are calculated and updated for that user. The stakeDate is also reset to block.timestamp. This means, for the next stake deposit, new rewards will be calculated from the last stakeDate.

findings.title: Centralization Risks
findings.description: The role owner has the authority to withdraw all the tokens from the contract at any point in time.

findings.title: Function input parameters lack of check
